description:
Custom designed for your precious Amazon Kindle Touch, this case features a combination of functionality and style. Premium Faux leather boosts a classy look; no-scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection; access to all controls and features. Well built to protect your Kindle Touch for the years to come.

title: MoKo(TM) Cover Case for Amazon Kindle Touch, BLACK
